channel.title: Friendship on Jiufeng
channel.description: Recent content in Friendship on Jiufeng

item.title: Vibe
item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description: The vibe between friends is so important. When you mention a movie, a book, or a rock band, and they instantly get it—then the conversation just flows like rapid-fire. It’s as if the distance between hearts shrinks down to nanometers. At the end of the day, I realize I’m a sapiosexual, craving that deep resonance of minds and souls.

item.title: Friendship
item.author: lijiufeng97@gmail.com (Jiufeng Li)
item.description:
Daily Thoughts

Sometimes, I still feel that friendship is an incredibly beautiful thing. Right now, I even rank the bond between friends above love and family—it brings a unique sense of relaxation and joy. As I grow older, I find myself cherishing my friends more and more!
